title: Is custom skins allowed 2017
body: Is custom skins still allowed in 2017?

replies.body: Custom skins is not allowed, but we aren't directly suspending an account for it.  This can change at any time though, but more info is also available in our [third party ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)guide.  Take care when using these as we can't offer support for it, and there's always the risk of malicious content hiding inside.  I hope that helps!
I thought the stance was more of "you are allowed to an extent at your own risk" type thing, not a flat out "no".

That seems to be what he is saying. Although it's not allowed, you can use them, but it's your reasonability and your fault if something happens due to using them. They just won't help you if say you get banned for third-party usage.
